name: Top-Down Shooter Zombie - Prototype
description:
Controls: WASD to move. Mouse to aim and Left Mouse Button to shoot

Top-Down shooter zombie prototype.

This was one of my first major prototypes during my First year at Uni. The prototype that started it all!

its features include: -

  • Following Zombies of 2 different types (normal and tank type)
  • Player Scoring system
  • Double damage and Health Item Pick ups
